instructions: Participants judge odds that a sample came from a male population (mean 5'10") vs female (mean 5'4") if: (i) sample is a single person 5'10"; (ii) sample is 6 persons average 5'8".

items.question: What are the odds that the investigator selected the male population if the sample consists of a single person whose height is 5 ft 10 in.?
What are the odds that the investigator selected the male population if the sample consists of 6 persons whose average height is 5 ft 8 in.?
